intro.title: Welcome to BookPro
intro.subtitle: Your strategic ally for booking management, client engagement, and growth.
intro.description: BookPro is an all-in-one platform designed for businesses that live by their time and need to optimize every minute. Whether you run a medical office, a yoga studio, a barbershop, or a learning center, BookPro automates the entire booking process: from the moment a client discovers you until they complete their payment and confirm their appointment. This allows you to focus on what really matters: delivering exceptional service and growing your business.

getting_started.title: Getting Started
getting_started.desc: Start your BookPro experience quickly and without complications. In this section, you'll learn how to set up your initial account and access the main tools.
steps: Business Registration: Create your account in less than 3 minutes. You only need to provide your name, email, and basic business data. BookPro will automatically generate your personalized workspace.

Dashboard Access: Once registered, you will access your administration panel (Dashboard), the command center from where you will manage bookings, clients, services, and income. All on one screen, no complications.

Dashboard Overview: On the main screen, you will see a visual summary of your upcoming appointments, day's income, active services, and your business status. Here you can make quick decisions, identify pending appointments, and know the financial health of your operation in real time.

config.title: Initial Setup
config.desc: Personalize your business so that BookPro reflects your professional identity. This initial setup is key to projecting trust and making it easier for your clients to book.
items: General Information: Define your business trade name, upload your logo (it will appear in emails and on the booking page), and write an attractive description that explains what you offer. This information is the first thing your clients see when they visit your booking page, so make it clear and professional.

Business Hours: Configure the days and hours you accept appointments. You can define different hours for each day of the week, add multiple intervals (e.g., morning and afternoon), include break blocks, and mark holidays or closed days. BookPro will show only available slots according to your real hours.

Currency and Region: Select your local currency (MXN, USD, EUR, etc.) and the communication language with your clients. This affects how prices are presented, email notifications, and date format on your public booking page. You can change the admin panel language from the selector in the top right corner.

Booking Policies: In the 'Policies' tab, you can decide if you allow the same client to book multiple times on the same day. You can also configure the 'Cancellation Window', which defines how many hours before the appointment a client can autonomously cancel their booking.

services.title: Service and Package Management (Catalog)
services.desc: Your catalog is the heart of BookPro: here you define WHAT you offer, HOW MUCH it costs, and HOW it is charged. This section allows you to create individual services (like a consultation or haircut) and multi-session packages (like a 10-class plan).
features: Create services with custom duration, price, and description. Define if they require pre-payment or are paid on-site. You can activate or deactivate services by season.

Configure recurring session packages: Offer volume discounts (e.g., '10-class pack for $1,000', ideal for fitness studios). Clients buy credits and BookPro automatically deducts them upon confirming each appointment.
Assign specific resources: If you offer services that require rooms, equipment, specific bikes, or instructors, you can manage their availability. BookPro avoids double booking of the same resource.

Define payment policies: For each service, you can choose if it's charged upon booking (reduces cancellations by 80%), if it's just a reservation without charge (ideal if you charge cash), or if a package purchase is required (membership model).

Copy direct booking links by service: Each service has a unique link you can share on social media, WhatsApp, or print on flyers. This facilitates conversion because it leads directly to the service without needing the client to navigate.

bookings.title: Booking Management
bookings.desc: Here you manage all your client appointments: from those pending confirmation to those completed. You have full visibility over who booked, when, what service they chose, and the payment status.
types: Client-created bookings from the public page: They arrive automatically at your panel. You can configure if they are confirmed instantly or require your manual approval (useful if you need to validate real availability).
Internal bookings created by you: From your panel, you can schedule appointments for clients who call by phone or walk in without a previous reservation. You can mark them as paid, pending, or free.

Automatic or manual confirmation: Depending on your configuration, bookings are confirmed automatically (ideal for 100% automated businesses) or require your approval (useful if you need to review each case).

Cancellation management: Define cancellation windows (e.g., 'allow cancellation up to 24 hours before'). BookPro notifies the client and releases the slot automatically. If pre-paid, you can define if the refund is automatic or manual.
Manual payment verification: If you accept bank transfer or cash, BookPro allows the client to upload a receipt. You review and manually validate from the panel before confirming the appointment.

Duplicate control: The system defaults to preventing a client from booking twice on the same day to avoid errors. You can disable this restriction in Settings > Policies if your business allows multiple daily sessions.

public_page.title: Public Page and Growth
public_page.desc: Your booking page is your 24/7 salesperson. It works without you being present: clients enter, select the service, choose date and time, pay (if applicable), and receive automatic confirmation. Now powered with smart marketing tools.
steps: Client enters from your unique link (e.g., bookpro.app/your-business) or scans one of your smart QR codes. They see your logo, description, and updated service catalog.
They select the service they need and the system automatically shows available slots according to your settings, avoiding blocked or after-hours dates.
They complete their details (name, email, phone), choose a payment method, and confirm. They receive an instant email with an access code to check or cancel their booking later.
Boost your reach by sharing your link in your Instagram bio, WhatsApp buttons, or Google campaigns. Every digital booking is data saved for your growth.

qr_marketing.title: QR Marketing Strategy
qr_marketing.desc: Convert the physical world into digital bookings. Your new smart QR codes are designed for different use scenarios and to maximize conversion.
features: General QR: The ideal entry point for your premises. Use it on the facade or reception for clients to explore your entire service catalog.
Service QR: Target specific needs. If you launch a promotion, generate a QR that leads directly to that service. Eliminates friction and increases conversion.
Package QR: Boost loyalty. Create specific codes for your session passes and promote them inside your establishment to incentivize volume purchases.
Contextual Formats: We optimize the design based on the channel. Choose 'Instagram' for stories, 'Flyer' for high-quality printing, or 'Reception' for clear visibility on the counter.
High-Resolution Download: All codes are generated in professional PNG format ready to be sent to printers or shared on your digital social networks.
Placement Tips: Place your QRs at eye level and ensure they have good lighting. Every scan is a potential client entering your business.

payments.title: Payments, Packages, and Memberships
payments.desc: BookPro allows you to charge in multiple ways: individual appointment payments, pre-paid session packages, and recurring memberships. This gives you flexibility to adapt to different business types and improve your cash flow.
items: Individual service payments: Charge at the time of booking with a card (through Stripe), or accept transfer/cash with manual validation. You reduce cancellations by ensuring financial commitment.

Session packages (Class packs): Ideal for yoga studios, gyms, therapies. For example: '10-class pack for $1,500'. The client buys the package once and BookPro automatically deducts a session upon confirming each appointment. You can define if the package expires or is unlimited in time.

Memberships with recurring billing: Offer monthly plans (e.g., 'Unlimited class access for $999/month'). BookPro handles automatic renewal via Stripe, preventing you from having to chase payments month after month.

Stripe Connect Configuration (Direct Payments): If you have a business account, BookPro helps you link it. Payments go directly to YOUR Stripe account instead of passing through BookPro. This gives you full control and reduces fees. If you don't have a business account yet, BookPro can mediate payments temporarily while you complete your tax registration.

Manual payment methods: Activate bank transfer and/or cash. Define your bank details (Account #, holder, bank) so clients know where to transfer. Manually validate receipts before confirming the appointment.

compliance.title: Tax and Legal Compliance
compliance.desc: If your business is registered with your tax authority (Hacienda, SAT, etc.), BookPro allows you to activate tax functions to issue invoices, apply taxes, and comply with local regulations.
features: Tax activation (IVA, VAT, Sales Tax): Configure the tax percentage applied in your country. BookPro automatically includes it in each booking summary and shows it broken down (subtotal + tax = total).
Business tax identifiers: Capture your RFC (Mexico), Tax ID (USA), or equivalent. This appears on the receipts and invoices BookPro generates, giving you legal validity and professionalism.

Client tax data (Invoicing): If your client requires an invoice, BookPro captures their RFC or business name at the time of booking. You can export this information to generate invoices in your accounting system or send them directly from BookPro (feature in development).
Legal cancellation policies: Define if you allow cancellations, until when, and if there is a refund. This appears clearly on the booking page and protects your business from legal disputes.

clients.title: Client Management (CRM)
clients.desc: BookPro automatically builds a database of your clients every time someone books with you. From your panel, you can check each client's full history, add private notes, and track package usage.
features: Full appointment history: See all past, future, and cancelled bookings for each client. Identify attendance patterns, preferred services, and visit frequency.
Private internal notes: Add comments about preferences, allergies, medical history (if applicable), or any important detail. Only you can see them, never the client.
Control of remaining sessions in packages: Check how many classes or sessions each client has left from their active packages. BookPro clearly shows which packages are about to expire or run out.
Quick search: Filter by name, email, phone, or last visit date. Useful for following up, sending targeted promotions, or quickly resolving doubts.
Data export (coming soon): You will be able to export your client base to Excel or CSV for external analysis, email marketing campaigns, or backups.

best_practices.title: Best Practices and Strategic Tips
best_practices.desc: Get the most out of BookPro by applying proven techniques that increase your income, reduce cancellations, and improve the client experience.
tips: Activate pre-payments whenever possible: Studies show that charging at booking reduces cancellations by 80%. If your business suffers from 'no-shows', this is the immediate solution.
Configure cleaning/sanitizing blocks between appointments: Add 10-15 minute margins between services to avoid accumulated delays. This improves your punctuality and client satisfaction.
Review and update your schedules weekly: Block holidays, vacations, or special events in advance. Avoid bookings on dates you cannot attend.
Offer discounted packages: Clients perceive more value in '10-session pack + 2 free' than in 12 individual sessions at the same price. Improve your cash flow by receiving payment for volume.
Share your QR code in strategic places: Place it at your reception, on business cards, in Instagram posts, and flyers. Make it easier for new clients to book without friction.
Monitor your metrics weekly: BookPro shows you income, occupancy rate, and best-selling services. Use this information to identify what works and what needs adjustment.

items.q1: What happens if a client loses their confirmation email?
items.a1: No problem. From your panel, go to the booking details and click 'Resend confirmation'. The client will receive a new email with their access code and all their appointment details.
items.q2: Can I offer free services or zero cost?
items.a2: Yes, completely. When creating or editing a service, simply set the price to $0. BookPro will automatically skip the payment screen and confirm the booking immediately. Useful for free discovery calls, special events, or courtesy services.
items.q3: Why does my client receive an error when trying to book?
items.a3: If the message says 'you already have an appointment for that day', it's because you have double-booking protection active. If you want your clients to be able to take several classes on the same day, go to Settings > Policies and activate 'Allow multiple bookings per day'.
